title: Exceptions to Limits on Disclosure of Financial Information
content:
Exceptions to Limits on Disclosure of Financial Information

State Regulations
§ 420.13 - Exception to opt out requirements for disclosure of nonpublic personal financial information for service providers and joint marketing
§ 420.14 - Exceptions to notice and opt out requirements for disclosure of nonpublic personal financial information for processing and servicing transactions
§ 420.15 - Other exceptions to notice and opt out requirements for disclosure of nonpublic personal financial information
§ 420.16 - Nondiscrimination regarding opting out

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
